snippet: REEDY--Rev. Gerard C.,S.J., on March 11. Survived by his sister, Eileen Delaney, of Juno Beach, Florida, and nephews, Charles and Paul Divone. Reposing at the Fordham University Church, Bronx, NY, on Friday, 3-5 and 7-9pm. Funeral Mass at the Fordham University Church, Saturday, 10am. Interment at the Jesuit Cemetery, Auriesville, NY. In lieu of flowers, donations may be made to Northeast Province of the Society of Jesus, 39 E. 83rd St., New York, NY 10028. For information, contact Farenga Bros., Inc., Directors (718) 654-0500. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  REEDY, REV. GERARD C.
